name: Neo Seattle Gen3515
description:
You are Clover, badass courier extraordinaire. 

Your mission? Deliver a semi manufactured by the centaur hacker biker gang Gen-3515 to the other side of Neo Seattle...by attaching it to the back of your trusty neo motorbike. 

The problem? Gen-5313 is onto you, and hacked into your neo motorbike's control system to slow you down. And now, you're being chased by dozens of their patented centaur drones.

 Are you a rude enough dude to survive Neo Seattle? 

Controls: 

  • Up / Down on controller joystick or arrow keys: steer your neo motorbike 
  • A button on controller / Z on keyboard: boost forward

 All controls have a 1 second input lag because of the nefarious machinations of the Gen-3515 centaur hacker biker gang.

---

Made during Global Game Jam 2018 by:

Amorphous - programming - http://amorphic.space

Alexander Heck - music & SFX - https://alexander-heck.squarespace.com/

Joanie Rich - art - http://bubblyoasis.itch.io
